author: stas
msg: - since when mod_perl is installed, Apache-Test doesn't run its install
targets, we have to do the trickery to do this from the top level
Makefile.PL, hence abstracting the code to add targets which will nuke
Apache/test.pl into a separate library install-pl, which is useful only
- correct the uninstall code, to check the existance of the packlist file,
so more than one 'make install' in a row will work without errors

author: stas
msg: Apache2.pm is now autogenerated and will adjust @INC to include
Apache2/ subdirs only if built with MP_INST_APACHE2=1

author: stas
msg: Change the default value for the argument 'readbytes' for
ap_get_brigade(), from 0 to 8192. other than being useless, 0 always
triggers an assert in httpd internal filters and 8192 is a good

author: gozer
msg: Fix DynaLoader breakeage when using DL_GLOBAL on OpenBSD
